hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Liquidity Gap Fill After BTC Consolidation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades in <2% range for 48+ hours while aggregate altcoin volume declines >30%, the first 1-hour breakout from BTC's range will trigger disproportionate altcoin liquidity catch-up in select large caps (SOL, AVAX).
hypothesis_content.rationale: Compressed BTC ranges with altcoin volume drought create latent liquidity gaps. Breakouts force market makers to reprice cross-pairs, creating asymmetric moves as alt liquidity replenishes.
entry_conditions: Aggregate top-10 altcoin volume (excl. ETH) down >30% vs 7d MA
SOL or AVAX funding rates neutral/negative

exit_conditions.take_profit: SOL/BTC or AVAX/BTC ratio up 4% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC retraces back into prior range

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC breaks range but altcoin ratios continue declining with no volume response
